name: The Best of All Worlds
description: When a mysterious undercover operation goes awry and Odo sends out a desperate distress call, a voyage toward Convergence Day becomes a race against time to save the Constable and countless others across the galaxy!
rules:
-- Unique Augment, Maquis, and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Fascination Lwaxana Troi, any version of Odo, Nausicaan Thug, Seska, or Klingons will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Fascination Lwaxana Troi, Odo, Nausicaan Thug, Seska, or Klingons
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Stonn
featured_crew.flavor: T’Pring's colleague at work at the El-Kestanktil. Stonn is in love with her and is even ready to duel with Spock to become T’Pring's fiancé.

action.name: Got To Say, You Are Very Attractive For A Prison Guard

featured_crew.name: Nausicaan Thug
featured_crew.flavor: One of Nausicaan dom-jot players who stabbed Picard in the heart during a bar fight.

featured_crew.name: Seska
featured_crew.flavor: After leaving Voyager, Seska later joined the Kazon as consort to First Maje Culluh.

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Seska
rewards.flavor: Serving on the Val Jean as a Maquis, Seska was later revealed to be a Cardassian operative disguised as a Bajoran.

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Troi
rewards.flavor: Lwaxana’s mere presence at the Bajoran Gratitude Festival was enough for everyone around her to begin to open up about their secret feelings.

action.name: I Came To See You, You Poor Sweet Tortured Man

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Stonn
rewards.flavor: T’Pring's colleague at work at the El-Kestanktil. Stonn is in love with her and is even ready to duel with Spock to become T’Pring's fiancé.

action.name: Got To Say, You Are Very Attractive For A Prison Guard

rewards.name: Seska
rewards.flavor: After leaving Voyager, Seska later joined the Kazon as consort to First Maje Culluh.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Stonn
rewards.flavor: T’Pring's colleague at work at the El-Kestanktil. Stonn is in love with her and is even ready to duel with Spock to become T’Pring's fiancé.

screens.text: "I don't know where I'll be by the time this reaches you, Captain, but I need your help. Convergence Day celebrations across the galaxy are in danger and I fear I may be caught before long. You must stop them!"
"That...that was Odo, wasn't it? I know that voice anywhere. But that can't be all there is to the message. We need to find him!"
"If you know what's good for you, you'll forget about the fake Klingon and cancel your Convergence Day celebrations...unless you want the blood of thousands on your hands."
"What have you done with him? We won't simply cave to your threats. We'll show you! We'll find Odo and carry on Convergence Day!"

"I don't know where I'll be by the time this reaches you, Captain, but I need your help. Convergence Day celebrations across the galaxy are in danger and I fear I may be caught before long. You must stop them!"
"That...that was Odo, wasn't it? I know that voice anywhere. But that can't be all there is to the message. We need to find him!"
"If you know what's good for you, you'll forget about the fake Klingon and cancel your Convergence Day celebrations...unless you want the blood of thousands on your hands."
"What have you done with him? We won't simply cave to your threats. We'll show you! We'll find Odo and carry on Convergence Day!"
